channel.title: Why do people hate project insanity so much?
channel.description:
Im just wondering, Project Insanity based sources seem well coded and easy to utilized in my opinion, why are they hated so much? any particular reason behind it?
i know not EVERYONE hates Project Insanity but i know a large amount do.

item.title: Why do people hate project insanity so much?
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:30, topic:470356”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=587759.msg4175844#msg4175844 date=1355000599]
Eclipse…?
[/quote]
It’s an rsps some guy made. Wierd name as it matches with the IDE eclipse also right?[/quote]

yeah it does

Read full topic

item.title: Why do people hate project insanity so much?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“x_9xp_x, post:31, topic:470356”]why i hate project insanity:

  • You see them everywhere.
  • Owners can usually barely code
  • Allways ask for rs acc donations
  • 12 yr old owners
  • Delta is more fun to code

Dont take this the wrong way i have allways hated pi for these reasons[/quote]
You registered like, four days ago… How old are you?

item.title: Why do people hate project insanity so much?
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

[quote=“Yesteryear, post:26, topic:470356”][quote author=Doobage link=topic=587759.msg4175326#msg4175326 date=1354928163]
Well personally, I rather take on a PI then the 711 Matrix crap.
[/quote]
There are other sources than PI and Matrix, fyi.[/quote]

I know this… lol but thats the only thing being Released atm is matrix eclipse and PI.

And as for clawz Fury

Like i said Im not that advanced at coding but im learning as i go along, even tho i’ve been coding since 2008, Im slow. Very slow. Not somehting im proud of but learning is still fun here.

but ill look into Emulous as well, but offtopic again:

Personally i’d love to see the older sources being used not matrix or pi. or Eclipse.

not that im hating, just that its too new and not what runescape pservers, imo, are all about.

Read full topic

item.title: Why do people hate project insanity so much?
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

Well personally, I rather take on a PI then the 711 Matrix crap thats being released on these forums.

I know this a bit offtopic but idk why people would use this shit. I mean come on. RuneScape Private servers are used BECAUSE of jagex being an idiot. Why is all this crap of the NEW RuneScape versions being used that suck…

I wish people designed more often like it was back in like… 2008/2009 when I came here.

Back when I used Hiyascape v2 as a main source base lol.

Rather use Hiyascapev2 source base then PI but. if PI is the only thing being released atm. Im going for it.

and i know people here are like WELL WHY DONT U JUST CODE FROM SCRATCH AND QUIT BEING A LAZY FUCK.

I would, just like to save time, and if i had the knowledge. I’d love to.

Read full topic

item.title: Why do people hate project insanity so much?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I’ve used Project Insanity for so long and I’ve finally realized that I should stop using it. It isn’t a good development environment if you are wanting to learn and have an efficient server.

item.title: Why do people hate project insanity so much?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:17, topic:470356”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=587759.msg4171072#msg4171072 date=1354346273]

PI isn’t bad, it’s the kids that use it. They C+P their tutorial-written code into it and have no idea what they’re doing usually.

Also the MINA.

MINA isn’t bad… When used correctly, it’s nearly as good as Netty. Sadly, people that use PI can’t even use Netty correctly >.>
[/quote]
I used ‘the’ as it is defining PI.[/quote]
As in the improper use of it?

Read full topic

item.title: Why do people hate project insanity so much?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

asshole_rule:

It’s bad because it’s horrible networking and total lack of object oriented code.

preach nick preach plz

edit: also, people hate PI because of how annoying it is, I honestly can’t find the words to explain how loveing annoying it is when someone:

  • releases a typical unstable PI with a bunch of tutorials used on it, and gets respected from everyone while the actual releases with hard work put into them get little to no replies and get shoved down the download page

  • thinks they’re hard stuff because they get 4000 downloads on a shitty half assed server they spent a week on

example: insidiaX, when I see help threads from people using that awful server I don’t even bother reading or helping them. Its so shit, but yet its been very popular lately

Read full topic
item.source: Why do people hate project insanity so much?
